verses.verse: Michtam of David. Preserve <WH8104> me <WH410>, O God; For in thee do I take refuge <WH2620>.
O my soul <WH559>, thou hast said unto Jehovah <WH3068>, Thou art my Lord <WH136>: I have no good beyond thee <WH2896>.
As for the saints <WH6918> that <WH1992> are in the earth <WH776>, They are the excellent <WH117> in whom is all my delight <WH2656>.

Their sorrows <WH6094> shall be multiplied <WH7235> that give <WH4116> gifts for another <WH312> god <WH5262>: Their drink-offerings of blood <WH1818> will I not offer <WH5258>, Nor <WH1077> take <WH5375> their names <WH8034> upon my lips <WH8193>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is the portion <WH4490> of mine inheritance <WH2506> and of my cup <WH3563>: Thou maintainest <WH8551> my lot <WH1486>.
The lines <WH2256> are fallen <WH5307> unto me in pleasant <WH5273> places <WH8231>; Yea, I have a goodly heritage <WH5159>.
I will bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068>, who hath given me counsel <WH3289>; Yea <WH3629>, my heart instructeth <WH3256> me in the night seasons <WH3915>.
I have set <WH7737> Jehovah <WH3068> always <WH8548> before me <WH3225>: Because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved <WH4131>.
Therefore my heart <WH3820> is glad <WH8055>, and my glory <WH3519> rejoiceth <WH1523>; My flesh <WH1320> also shall dwell <WH7931> in safety <WH983>.
For thou wilt not leave <WH5800> my soul <WH5315> to Sheol <WH7585>; Neither wilt thou suffer <WH5414> thy holy one <WH2623> to see <WH7200> corruption <WH7845>.

Thou wilt show <WH3045> me the path <WH734> of life <WH2416>: In thy presence <WH6440> is fulness <WH7648> of joy <WH8057>; In thy right hand <WH3225> there are pleasures <WH5273> for evermore <WH5331>.
